name: Mercenary
ability: You start knowing two opposing players. If the one opposite to your alignment dies, choose two players tonight: they die. If the player of your alignment dies, you die tonight.

name: Tour Guide
ability: You start knowing a secret word. Each night*, any players who said your secret word yesterday might die.

name: Vampire
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, you may choose again. They will die the next time chosen by a death-inducing ability, even if unable to or the user is drunk or poisoned.

name: Botanist
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are sober and receive true information or they are drunk or poisoned until dusk.

name: Forager
ability: One player starts with the Forage token. Each night, learn a player: they learned a hint about who holds the Forage token. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess who holds the Forage token: if correct, your team wins.

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: President
ability: Each day, you may publicly make a promise. If a player catches you breaking a promise, you can’t vote today. If none catch you, you switch teams. [No starting info]

name: Celebrity
ability: Each night*, until dusk, a player who was “mad” about everything you said today acts twice.

name: Interpol
ability: Each day, you may interrogate the players involved about any one whisper. If any are executed today, you learn whether any of them lied to you.

name: United Nations
ability: Each day, if all living players vote to ratify you, you run nominations, and you may change the nomination and voting rules, except on yourself.

name: Spymaster
ability: Each night*, players may secretly message you. Then, you may choose one who did: they change characters.

name: LIZARD (Trav)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Barnacle
ability: Each night*, learn the character of someone who voted today: they might die.
